data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Guelmim Oued Noun to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guelmim Oued Noun, Morocco

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Guelmim Oued Noun, Morocco.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Guelmim Oued Noun, Morocco.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Guelmim Oued Noun, Morocco to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Saharawi people.
Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Guelmim Oued Noun, Morocco.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Guelmim Oued Noun, Morocco to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Guelmim Oued Noun, Morocco has a population of 433,800.

We estimate Guelmim Oued Noun has 455 people who might know Jesus, 364 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 432,981 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 953 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Guelmim Oued Noun, Morocco. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
